question: Mairaj Ahmed Khan, who won silver at 14th Asian Shooting Championship at Doha is from which Indian state?
explanation: Angad Vir Singh Bajwa who secured gold and Mairaj Ahmad Khan from Bulandshahar winning silver added to India’s rich Olympic quota haul with a sensational 1-2 finish in the men’s skeet event at the 14th Asian Shooting Championship at Doha. Their medals ensured India secured an unprecedented 15 quota places for the 2020 Tokyo Olympics.This is India’s best-ever Olympic quota haul, easily surpassing the 12 at the 2016 Rio Games and 11 in London in 2012.
